H0.text: In which year were Queen Victoria and Prince Albert married; the uniform penny post introduced in the UK; Tchaikovsky was born. 1837

H1.text: In which year were Queen Victoria and Prince Albert married; the uniform penny post introduced in the UK; Tchaikovsky was born. 1838

H2.text: In which year were Queen Victoria and Prince Albert married; the uniform penny post introduced in the UK; Tchaikovsky was born. 1820

H3.text: In which year were Queen Victoria and Prince Albert married; the uniform penny post introduced in the UK; Tchaikovsky was born. 1840

A4.text: The Post Office (Duties) Act 1840 introduced the Uniform Penny Post.

A5.text: In 1840, the first year of Penny Post, the number of letters sent in the UK more than doubled.
